entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -34.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
